articles.title: Prospect of Working Contact and KIZ Entirely Depends on Future Attitude of South Side
articles.content:
Prospect of Working Contact and KIZ Entirely Depends on Future Attitude of South Side
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Bureau for Central Guidance to the Development of the Special Zone issued a statement on Friday in connection with the fact that the working contact on the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) has been pushed to the phase of breakdown due to the insincere attitude on the part of the south Korean authorities.
					 The south side, displeased with the working contact from its very beginning, reluctantly responded to the contact and brought to light its confrontational nature at the fourth contact, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The south side not only totally denied the discussion on the main agenda item, raising a spate of issues irrelevant to the revision of the contracts on the KIZ, the main subject of the contact, but far-fetchedly asserted it could not accept the just request of the north side, oft-repeating extremely wrong assertions and unreasonable sophism.  The south side's rude and insincere attitude is an intolerable mockery and challenge to the sincere efforts of the north side and, at the same time, a deliberate and premeditated provocation intended to drive the working contact to breakdown and torpedo the business in the KIZ. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have been driven into catastrophe and the military tension has reached an extreme phase but the north side made every possible effort to prevent the KIZ from being badly affected by the situation. The north side advanced constructive proposals on reexamining and renegotiating the measures for special treatment taken to suit the changed situation and present reality and arranged a special working contact even under the situation where the relations between the authorities of both sides were totally suspended. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the south side behaved quite contrary to the gesture of the north side, defying its sincere efforts. 
					
					 This clearly proves that the south Korean authorities do not have even an iota of intention to solve the issue of the KIZ but is only keen to lay the blame for the deplorable situation at the door of the north side and put the zone under collapse. 
					
					 The north side felt disillusioned with the south side from the very beginning of the contact with the south side and was compelled to seriously reconsider the issue of whether it would continue the contact with such ungrateful and impolite counterpart or not. 
					
					 Although the south side is touting the so-called "three principles", they are nothing but hypocrisy. The south side totally negated the historic June 15 joint declaration, asserting  the "observance of the existing agreement," raised issues irrelevant to the working contact, talking about "politics-business separation" and working hard to bring the KIZ under collapse, advocating "increased competitiveness and future-oriented." 
					
					 Now that the south Korean authorities are challenging the DPRK, defiling the latter's magnanimity and sincerity, it cannot but express apprehensions as to whether it is possible to seek a negotiated settlement of the issue through the working contact on the KIZ or not.    In case the south side fails to honestly approach the working contact, the north side will go according to its decision as it has already clarified. The prospect of the working contact on the KIZ and the zone will entirely depend on the future attitude of the south side.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's "Civil Operation" Plan under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's "Civil Operation" Plan under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Recently the puppet Ministry of Defence of south Korea made public a draft "amendment to the basic plan for national defence reforms", a provocative scenario for a war of aggression against the north. This comes under fire by information bulletin No. 952 issued by the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea on July 9. 
					 In this draft amendment the warmongers of the south Korean puppet military made public a scenario for staging "civil operation" by mobilizing the puppet reserve forces independent of the regular troops participating in the combat operation, talking about "occupation" of someone's territory in case a war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 According to this, the puppets blustered that they would reorganize 10 divisions into units for "civil operation" out of the "Homeland Defence Reserve Forces" from 2010 to 2011, conduct regular education every year with main emphasis on an actual war in a bid to hurl them into operation any time and sharply reinforce military equipment in the units including armored cars in an effort to boost the maneuverability in case of "emergency." 
					
					 The information bulletin termed this as a serious provocation to the DPRK, a total negation of the dignified Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses and an unpardonable challenge to the unanimous aspiration and desire of the Koreans to achieve the peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					  It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to achieve the country's reunification independently and peacefully in conformity with the will and interests of all Koreans, the information bulletin stressed, declaring that it is the mettle of the DPRK not to allow the aggressors and provokers to disturb peace and obstruct reunification even a bit. 
					
					 The above-said warmongers' moves to work out the "civil operation" plan are nothing but foolish, poor and ridiculous ones which only betray their utter ignorance of the DPRK, the information bulletin noted.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Meeting of Officials of Chongryon Branches
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Meeting of Officials of Chongryon Branches
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on July 9 sent a congratulatory message to the participants in the second meeting of the officials of branches of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) now underway in Tokyo.
					 The message said that the meeting is a historic one of weighty significance in further strengthening the basic organizations of Chongryon and developing the movement of Koreans in Japan onto a new high stage as required by the developing reality, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Over the past years the officials of Chongryon branches have firmly defended the Chongryon organization, gave full play to the Juche character and national identity in the society of Koreans in Japan and creditably performed a vanguard role in all the patriotic work including the work of inviting Koreans in Japan to come to the fold of Chongryon with indomitable faith and patriotic conscience despite difficulties, the message said.
					
					 The SPA Presidium is rejoiced over the fact that the officials of Chongryon branches have covered the road of noble patriotism and performed worthwhile feats for the country and the nation, the message said, highly estimating their feats.
					
					 It said that Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan will always make victorious advance along the road of justice under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea and patriotism even though there may be temporary difficulties and turns and twists in the way of patriotic cause of Chongryon.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the meeting would mark an occasion of decisive turn in further strengthening basic organizations to consolidate Chongryon organizationally and ideologically and expand its own patriotic forces, and wished the meeting good result.

articles.title: Greetings to Mongolian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Mongolian President
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorzh, President of Mongolia, on the occasion of the 88th anniversary of the victorious Mongolian people's revolution.
					Kim Yong Nam in the message expressed the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Mongolia would continue to grow stronger and wished the President and the people of Mongolia successes in their work for prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Mongolian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Mongolian PM
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greetings to S. Bayar, Prime Minister of Mongolia, on the occasion of the 88th anniversary of the victorious Mongolian people's revolution, a national holiday of the Mongolian people.
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would expand and develop in various fields, the message wished the prime minister success in his work for development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to PM of Bahamas
articles.content:
Greetings to PM of Bahamas
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Premier Kim Yong Il of the DPRK sent a message of greetings to his Bahamian counterpart Hubert Alexander Ingraham on Friday on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of the independence of the country.
					 In the message Kim wished him success in his noble work for the development of the country and welfare of the people.

articles.title: Tribute to Kim Hyong Jik Paid
articles.content:
Tribute to Kim Hyong Jik Paid
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Wreathes were laid before the statue of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea, in Ponghwa-ri, Kangdong County of Pyongyang and his grave in Mangyongdae on Friday on the occasion of his 115th birth anniversary.
					 Seen there were wreathes from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Ri Yong Mu and others, officials of party, power and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and servicepersons and working people and school youth and children in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Placed before the statue and grave were wreathes in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the DPRK Cabinet and ministries, national institutions and scientific, educational, cultural and art and health organs, military universities and party and power organs, enterprises, farms and schools in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid a silent tribute to Kim Hyong Jik, looking back on the brilliant revolutionary career and exploits performed by him who brought about the dawn of the Korean revolution with ardent patriotism and devoted his all to the sacred cause for the independence of the country and the people's freedom and liberation.
					
					 On the same day wreathes and flowers were laid before his statues at Kim Hyong Jik Military Medical University and in Sakju County, North Phyongan Province, and Junggang County, Jagang Province.

articles.title: Kim Hyong Jik, Trailblazer of Untrodden Path of History
articles.content:
Kim Hyong Jik, Trailblazer of Untrodden Path of History
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Today the Korean people are observing the 115th birth anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, who devoted his all to the sacred cause for the independence of Korea.
					 Having keenly experienced the dark realities of the country and the miserable lot of the fellow countrymen under the jackboots of the Japanese imperialists, he put forth the great idea of Jiwon (Aim High) in his early years with an indomitable will to achieve the national independence without fail.
					
					 The idea was an outstanding one which lighted a correct target and the way of struggle for accomplishing the independence of the country and the liberation of the nation with the efforts of the Korean people and a thoroughgoing revolutionary one reflecting the will to make the proletarian revolution and build a new society of the people.
					
					 He, taking Jiwon as his life-long motto, consistently applied it to the whole course of his revolutionary activities.
					
					 Having displayed his organizational ability as a prominent leader of the students' movement already in the days of attending Sungsil Middle School, he vigorously waged activities for enlightening the popular masses and rallying comrades and formed the Korean National Association in March of Juche 6 (1917).
					
					 Meanwhile, he, basing himself on the deep-going analysis of the situation at home and abroad and the lessons of the March First Popular Uprising, proved the historical necessity for the proletarian revolution and put forth the policy of shifting the anti-Japanese national liberation movement from a nationalist one to a proletarian one at the Kuandian Meeting in August of 1919.
					
					 He went deep into the people without hesitation with the noble idea of Jiwon though he could not move well owing to the aftermath of cruel torture and frostbite.
					
					 He established schools and evening schools everywhere he went under difficult conditions of an underground struggle and exerted his heart and soul to implant the spirit of national independence and anti-Japanese patriotic idea in the minds of young people.
					
					 In particular he brought up the members of the Mangyongdae family to be ardent patriots, great revolutionaries who devoted themselves to the struggle for the country and people.
					
					 Indeed, the undying feats performed by Kim Hyong Jik paving the untrodden path of history for the country and people are shining still century after century.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at Asian Youth Games
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at Asian Youth Games
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- DPRK players won one gold medal, four silver medals and four bronze medals at the 1st Asian Youth Games.
					 Kim Jong Gum finished first with a record of 12.34m in the girls' triple jump while the DPRK boys' football team came second.
					
					Ko Yong Sim bagged a silver medal in the girls' 1,500m race, Sin Ji Hyang in the girls' 10-m platform and Kim Jin Su and Kim Song I in the mixed doubles of the table tennis event.
					
					 Jong Un Sim placed third in the girls' pole vault, Pak Kum Hyang in the girls' discus throw, Hyon Il Myong in the boys' 10-m platform and Kim Song I in the girls' singles of the table tennis event.

articles.title: After-Census Held
articles.content:
After-Census Held
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- An after-census was held to examine accuracy and quality of the simultaneous census which was undertaken with October 1, Juche 97 (2008) as a starting point in the DPRK.
					 An after-census technical committee was formed for the successful undertaking. It has worked out an action programme and timetable, selected a model area where people tantamount to one percent of the national population live and issued questionnaire and directives for census-takers and analysers.
					
					 A work was undertaken for training those selected in all provinces as census-taker and supervisor and organizational work and technical guidance for census and confirmation, the input and analysis of the data were made.
					
					 The after-census examined the mistake of the simultaneous census in counting the number of population, the relations with the householder, sexes, ages, final standard of education, marriage and other important matters of population information.
					
					 A section chief of the Population Centre Yang Song Il told KCNA that as the simultaneous census was done satisfactorily, the after-census drew a conclusion that the mistake in the number of population was negligible and the level of discord between question and answer of the census data was lower.
					
					 The negligible mistake in the number of population, he went on, is thanks to the establishment of a well-arranged resident registration system in the country, the government's measure to restrict population move for the time being before and after the simultaneous census and the selection of those who are engaged in registration and management of population as census-taker.
					
					 The high standard of responsibility of the census-takers and respondents and strict investigation according to the questionnaire lowered the level of discord between question and answer remarkably.
					
					 Now the second simultaneous census is on progress at the final stage.

articles.title: Film Preview Held
articles.content:
Film Preview Held
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Korean April 25 Film Studio recently produced feature film "Ship Wreck".
					 The film portrays how a male lead, a university graduate, comes to working class awareness and wages an anti-spy struggle while working as an engineer at a ship repair yard. 
					
					 It makes a truthful artistic depiction of the fact that the imperialists' plot is bound to meet the fate of shipwreck thanks to the struggle of all the people to firmly protect the socialist system at present when the fight minus gunshot is going on to frustrate the moves of the enemies against the DPRK. 
					
					 A film preview was held at the Taedongmun Cinema Friday.
					
					 Appreciating the film were senior party and state officials, chairpersons of friendly parties, officials of ministries and national institutions, creators and artistes in the field of culture and arts, media persons and officials and working people in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visits Junggang Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visits Junggang Revolutionary Site
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of people is visiting the Junggang Revolutionary Site on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter.
					 Staying there from December Juche 7 (1918) to fall next year Kim Hyong Jik gave guidance to the work of the organizations of the Korean National Association in different parts in Korea and abroad and waged strenuous struggle including the work to closely rally the people from all walks of life under the banner of the anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 There are the Junggang Inn where Kim Hyong Jik stayed, an angling site and a ferry where he often organized the secret meetings and instilled the patriotic will into his sons, Private Sinsong School in Jungsang-ri where he educated young men in the national independent consciousness and progressive idea and the Tonggu Chemist's Shop and other places in the site. 
					
					 Nearly six million servicepersons, officials of many different units, working people and school youth and children across the country, overseas Koreans and foreigners visited this site for the last more than five decades.

articles.title: Koreans Build Economic Power with Mental Power
articles.content:
Koreans Build Economic Power with Mental Power
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons and people of the DPRK, who have become persons of firm confidence, will and powerful spirit, overcoming ordeals under the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, are now building an economic power vigorously.
					 It is firm resolution and will for the WPK to open without fail the gate to the great, prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the year of 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, by giving full play to the mental strength of the people.
					
					 Over last decades the DPRK has created things from nothing and consolidated its economic and military power as firm as a rock by mobilizing the strong spirit of the popular masses.
					
					 It built a powerful socialist country on debris through the great Chollima upsurge after the war and, after then, brought about the heyday of the WPK era through the vigorous speed campaign at every grand socialist construction site.
					
					 It is thanks to the mental power of the Korean people that they had won a great victory in the struggle for defending socialism, heroically bridging over the adversities of the "Arduous March".
					
					 The new century has witnessed the construction of large and minor power stations including the Anbyon Youth Power Station, Nyongwon Power Station and Wonsan Youth Power Station, the reconstruction and modernization of leading metallurgical bases, machine-building factories, chemical industry factories and mining bases and many updated light industry factories.
					
					 The Namhung Youth Chemical Complex is pushing ahead at the final stage with the gasification project which is of great significance in fertilizer production.
					
					 Efforts are being made to wind up the new gasification project at an early date in the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex which has already put its fertilizer production system on modern footing and the successful completion of a new vinalon production process is drawing near in the February 8 Vinalon Complex.
					
					 These successes prove that the mental power is, indeed, a powerful means for creating miracles.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed in History of Movement for National Reunification Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Performed in History of Movement for National Reunification Lauded
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung clarified an idea of great unity of all Koreans for building a driving force for national reunification and provided a powerful engine for it by expanding and strengthening the independent forces for reunification.
					 This was a distinguished exploit performed by him in the history of the movement for national reunification.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The 10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country put forward by the President is a library for great national unity as it represents the unshakable patriotic will of all the fellow countrymen to achieve reunification without fail by the concerted efforts of all Koreans who are the driving force for national reunification and responsible for achieving it.
					
					 The goal and the ideological basis of the great national unity and the principles and ways for achieving unity laid down in this programme serve as a banner for uniting all Koreans as one under the banner of reunification, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The programme clearly indicates principled requirements, orientation and ways for making all Koreans a driving force for accomplishing the cause of national independence, the cause of national reunification, and increasing their role and successfully waging the movement for national reunification. Herein lies a source of the magnetic power and tremendous vitality of the idea of great national unity expounded by the President.
					
					 The conception and idea of great national unity put forward by him and his love for the people and the nation have served as a source of strength that encouraged the Koreans from all walks of life to turn out in the struggle for national unity and reunification.
					
					 Inspired by his leadership replete with ardent patriotism, patriotic forces for reunification have rapidly grown in the north and the south and abroad and there have emerged a powerful independent driving force for national reunification as all the Koreans desirous of reunification are united under the banner of great national unity.
					
					 A principle of independence has been firmly established in the movement for national reunification and there emerged a nation-wide front embracing all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad and forces for national independence and reunification are waging a dynamic movement for national reunification, prevailing over the separatist forces inside and outside south Korea. This was entirely the brilliant fruition of the President's all-embracing patriotic politics and leadership over the movement for national reunification.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Marked
Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates a signed article to the 20th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Hasten Socialist Construction with National Pride and Revolutionary Self-confidence."
					The work is run through with the fundamental spirit that all the victories and achievements won by the DPRK are a striking demonstration of the greatness of the Workers' Party of Korea and the ideology and cause of the DPRK and its inexhaustible might and the DPRK should continue advancing along the road of Juche and socialism chosen by it, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					The high national pride and self-esteem serve not only as an ideological and moral source making it possible for the people of the DPRK to build a rich and powerful nation on this land by their own efforts in Korean style but a powerful engine for effecting a great leap forward and innovation in the drive for building a rich and powerful country at a new speed of advance.
					
					The Korean people are more dynamically making a general advance based on self-reliance for attaining the WPK's grandiose goal for building a thriving nation with unshakable faith in their ideology and cause and will. Recently, the scientists and technicians of the DPRK successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 entirely by their own efforts and with their own technology while the workers of the Taehung Youth Hero Mine realized the Juche orientation of magnesia clinker production on the highest level. All these spectacular successes made in the on-going drive to effect a great surge are the shining fruition of high national pride and self-confidence. 
					
					All miracles and changes taking place in the great drive for building a thriving nation are associated with the firm faith and pluck of the people to put the country on the status of a thriving nation. The Korean people bring about uninterrupted creations and innovations through persevering efforts, feeling ashamed of lagging behind others and not complacent with the successes already achieved. This is their proud fighting traits. It is the mettle of the Koreans to build up their own strength, always standing firm on the position of socialism and looking down on the world, and make a breakthrough towards victory with their own resources, technology and on the basis of the advantages of their system.
					
					It is the unshakable will of the people to effect a great leap forward in building a rich and powerful country with high national pride and self-confidence.

articles.title: True Aim of Lee Myung Bak Group's Plan for Suppression Disclosed
articles.content:
True Aim of Lee Myung Bak Group's Plan for Suppression Disclosed
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that the puppet police's unprecedented campaign of fascist suppression against the progressive pro-reunification forces in south Korea is under way according to a "100-day plan for investigating violators of the public security." 
					 Commenting on this, a news analyst of Minju Joson Friday observes:
					
					 The said plan is a fascist one to totally stamp out the progressive pro-reunification forces in a brief span of time though Lee Myung Bak failed to do so in more than one year of his office. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that as long as Kang Hui Rak remains "chief of the Police Agency" the progressive pro-reunification forces in south Korea can never conduct free activities nor is it possible to improve the north-south relations.
					
					 All repressive machines including "the prosecution" and "intelligence service" are involved in the scorched earth operation launched by the puppet police against the progressive pro-reunification forces according to the above-said plan. This shows in what serious ruling crisis traitor Lee finds itself at present. 
					
					 The fascist repressive campaign kicked off by Lee to eliminate the progressive pro-reunification forces is expected to last even after the first half of July when the "100-day plan for investigation" is set to end. This is based on his calculation that only by doing so can he prolong his dirty remaining days through sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Lee group is the real "violator of security" in south Korea because it is keen on suppressing the progressive pro-reunification forces under the pretext of confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north. 
					
					 The Lee group's moves to stifle progressive pro-reunification forces are as foolish an act as strangling its' neck with its' own hands. Lee is following in the footsteps of Syngman Rhee, Park Chung Hee, Chun Doo Hwan, Roh Tae Woo and Kim Young Sam who met miserable ends.

articles.title: Scheme to Gag Press Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Scheme to Gag Press Flayed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- More than 130 media persons of south Korea issued a statement on July 6 in which they demanded the "Grand National Party" stop at once all acts of violating freedom of assembly, association, speech and expression and human rights.
					 The statement accused the GNP of working hard to adopt a law on media despite the people's opposition and criticism.
					
					 This goes to prove again that the GNP is a group of dictators who are engaging themselves in high-handed and arbitrary practices, turning aside the demand of the people, it said.
					
					 It charged that the GNP, which left no stone unturned to control broadcasting services, is seeking to mislead the public opinion enraged at the traitorous "government" and put media under its control while impudently crying out for "diversity and democratic development of media."
					
					 If the evil law on media is passed, the elementary and basic rights of the people will be encroached more severely in south Korea, the statement warned.

articles.title: Death Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated by Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Death Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Commemorated by Koreans in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A memorial service of Korean residents in Japan was held in Tokyo on July 8 to commemorate the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Chief Vice-Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairmen of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), deputies to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, advisors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the head of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, directors of the above-said committee, leading officials of central organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, and officials and advisors of the Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area and compatriots and Korean youth and students.
					
					 The participants in the service observed a moment's silence in memory of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Ho Jong Man made a memorial address.
					
					 In the address he said that Kim Il Sung was a peerlessly great man who performed immortal feats for the prosperity of the country and the nation with noble patriotism during his whole life. The President is always alive in the hearts of the Korean nation and the world's progressive people, he stressed.
					
					 The speaker recalled that the President put forward the Korean residents in Japan, who suffered humiliation with sorrow of being members of a ruined nation in the past, as overseas citizens of the DPRK and formed Chongryon, definitely turning the movement of Koreans in Japan into a patriotic movement guided by the Juche idea.
					
					Noting that the President's revolutionary idea and exploits have been creditably defended and developed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he said that Kim Jong Il is leading Chongryon associated with the President's physical and mental energy to victory and taking warm care of it with paternal love while reliably defending the national dignity and rights of the Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 The Chongryon officials and compatriots in Japan will lay a solid foundation to bring about a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan this year by keeping step with the people in the homeland who are making great leap forward and innovations to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of the birth of the President, he declared.

articles.title: Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded in South Africa
articles.content:
Exploits of Peerlessly Great Men Lauded in South Africa
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party who is chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, issued a statement on July 4 to commemorate the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said that the President is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives as the benevolent father and teacher as he built a powerful socialist state in Korea to provide the peoples of developing countries with the great inspiring banner for building a new society while rendering material and mental assistance to their struggle.
					
					 The exploits performed by him in accomplishing socialism of Korea and the human cause of independence will remain long in the world history of politics, it stressed.
					
					 It said that though 15 years have passed since his demise, the President seems to still lead the country and the people, thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who is perfectly carrying forward his cause.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il has turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist fortress with powerful self-defensive deterrence by reliably inheriting the Songun idea and the cause of the President, the statement said: This is a great encouragement to the peoples of developing countries.
					
					 The noble cause of Kim Il Sung will be surely realized as Kim Jong Il is leading Korean-style socialism with his distinguished leadership ability and original Songun politics, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, praised the revolutionary life of President Kim Il Sung as the brilliant life during which he devoted his all to the prosperity of the country, happiness of the people and the human cause of independence.
					 The President is the great leader who founded the immortal Juche idea to clearly indicate the way for the popular masses to carve out their own destinies independently, he said on July 8 when he was interviewed by a reporter during his visit to the DPRK.
					
					 He further said: The President always went among the people since he set out on the road of revolution in his early years and settled all problems arising in the revolution and construction in reliance on their strength and turned the DPRK into a socialist power.
					
					 The world progressive people are highly praising the President as the sun of Juche, he said, adding that the President would be always with the progressive humankind.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Days Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Days Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Pakistan and Tunisia, lectures, reading sessions and film shows in Peru, Spain and Nigeria and a book exhibition in Ethiopia between June 13 and 19 on the occasions of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 9th anniversary of publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Displayed at the book exhibition were works of Kim Jong Il and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Akrak Aktar Hamidi, chairman of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies, in his speech highly praised the immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the strengthening and development of the WPK and stressed that the Korean people wisely led by him would certainly realize the reunification of the country and the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Victor Oliva Miguel, general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, said in a lecture that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee 45 years ago was a historic event in carrying forward to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Thanks to the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, Korea will be reunified without fail, he said, declaring that they would fully support the Korean people's just struggle for national reunification.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were such Korean films as "The Kumsusan Memorial Palace" and "The Reply of the DPRK".
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Pakistan.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported
						
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist) issued statements supporting the Korean people's cause of national reunification and rejecting the anti-DPRK and anti-reunification moves of the United States and the Lee Myung Bak group and the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK on June 15, the 9th publication anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 A statement titled "9th publication anniversary of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration" said that all the achievements gained by the Korean people are arousing sympathy from the progressive humankind and the DPRK has become a fortress foiling the U.S. wild design to dominate the world.
					
					 It wished the Korean people fresh success in the struggle for national reunification.
					
					 A statement entitled "Korea is one! We denounce the Lee Myung Bak regime's retrogression! We oppose the U.S. nuclear blackmail!" expressed full support for the Korean people's cause of national reunification, saying that at present the people of Canada are obliged to inform other peoples of the reality of the Korean Peninsula as part of the action for redressing the wrongs it did against the Korean people.
					
					 A statement titled "The UNSC, roll back its 'resolution 1874'! The United States, take off its hands from Korea!" condemned the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" as one more provocative move of the U.S. seeking to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Elimination of Sycophantic and Traitorous Forces of S. Korea Urged
articles.content:
Elimination of Sycophantic and Traitorous Forces of S. Korea Urged
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany said in the joint appeal issued on July 4 that different political parties and organizations supporting the three principles of national reunification should bravely turn out in the struggle to abolish the "National Security Law" and eliminate the south Korean sycophantic and traitorous forces by firmly uniting in the idea of "By our nation itself" transcending the differences of political views, policies, lines and stands. 
					 The appeal referred to the fact that 37 years have passed since the July 4 joint statement reflecting the three principles of national reunification --independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity-- was published.
					
					 The three principles were reflected in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as they are unchangeable truth and the inter-Korean declarations have been regarded as milestone of national reunification by the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 The appeal accused the south Korean Lee Myung Bak group of its moves of fully denying the inter-Korean declarations and pushing the inter-Korean relations into a situation of war while staking its fate on depending on foreign forces.
					
					 What is more unpardonable is that the traitorous group is resorting to  such foolish moves against reunification and nation without hesitation as suppressing those of reunification movement including the chairman of the South Side Headquarters of Pomminryon who have been devoted to the movement on charge of the violation of the NSL.
					
					 The frantic foolish moves of the pro-U.S. traitors can not be allowed anymore, the appeal stressed.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from South Korea Urged
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from South Korea Urged
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued a statement on June 25 in which he declared that the Koreans in China would wage a more vigorous struggle for decisively frustrating the reckless moves of the United States and Lee Myung Bak group for a war of aggression against the DPRK and driving the U.S. troops out of south Korea without delay. 
					 Recalling that the Korean war of aggression ignited by the U.S. imperialists 59 years ago was the most brutal and brigandish war in the history of world wars, the statement continued:
					
					 The United States has massively introduced weapons of mass destruction and advanced war equipment including nuclear weapons into south Korea in a bid to bring the disaster of another war and staged ceaseless military provocations and joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK, keeping its forces in the half of the land of Korea instead of drawing a due lesson from the shameful defeat it sustained in the three-year Korean War.
					
					 Recently the U.S. brought the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear test for self-defence to the UN to pull up it over them and is now applying with bloodshot eyes provocative sanctions against it. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is getting more undisguised in the confrontation with the DPRK as evidenced by its full participation in the PSI under the U.S. backstage manipulation.
					
					 The present reality goes to prove that peace on the Korean Peninsula and the reunification of the country would be unthinkable without struggling against the U.S. imperialists and traitor Lee Myung Bak. 
					
					 Should the U.S. imperialists ignite another war, oblivious of the lesson drawn from their past defeat, the heroic Korean People's Army will fully display its invincible might of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu which has grown under the care of the great Songun commander and bury the aggressors in this land to the last man, the statement warned.

articles.title: Acto central por el 115o aniversario de nacimiento de Kim Hyong Jik
articles.content:
Acto central por el 115o aniversario de nacimiento de Kim Hyong Jik
						
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 115o aniversario del nacimiento de Kim Hyong Jik, indoblegable combatiente revolucionario y destacado dirigente del movimiento antijapones de liberacion nacional de Corea.
					  Al acto asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Ri Yong Mu y otros cuadros, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, los ministerios e instituciones centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores capitalinos, coreanos en ultramar y el representante de la Sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					  El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Yang Hyong Sop, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.
					
					  Toda la vida de Kim Hyong Jik fue la sagrada del nacionalista y patriota de verdad quien dedico todo lo suyo por la independencia del pais y la liberacion de la nacion, comenzo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					Ademas, devino la brillante vida del distinguido revolucionario que acumulo inmortales hazanas dignas de registrarse en la historia nacional de 5 mil anos y la del movimiento de liberacion nacional de Corea.
					
					  Kim Hyong Jik fue gran procer quien al presentar la noble idea de "Jiwon" (gran proposito), sembro en el pueblo coreano la fe en la independencia del pais, el espiritu de la independencia nacional y el indoblegable temple de lucha e ilumino el nuevo camino del movimiento antijapones de la liberacion nacional.
					
					  La idea "Jiwon", teoria revolucionaria que contiene la confianza absoluta en la fuerza del pueblo, la firme posicion de lograr la independencia con las propias fuerzas y el indoblegable espiritu de superar cualesquier pruebas y dificultades, devino entonces la unica idea directriz del movimiento referido y la fuente ideo-espiritual que incito el inicio y el avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. He aqui la gran proeza historica de Kim.
					
					  Gracias a la fundacion por el de la Asociacion Nacional de Corea en el 23 de marzo de 1917, el pueblo coreano pudo tener la organizacion revolucionaria directiva, capaz de conducir de manera unificada el movimiento de liberacion nacional en todo el pais aglutinando en uno a todas las fuerzas patrioticas antijaponesas.
					
					  Igualmente, este movimiento pudo avanzar a pasos firmes por las fuerzas independientes de la nacion coreana.
					
					  Kim Hyong Jik fue gran precursor quien guio al frente el giro de la direccion del movimiento nacionalista a la revolucion proletaria levantando la bandera de esta revolucion.
					
					  Tambien, fue educador revolucionario, indoblegable combatiente y verdadero hombre quien mantuvo en toda la trayectoria de su lucha revolucionaria el calido amor por las nuevas generaciones, el firme temperamento revolucionario y nobles virtudes.
					
					  El Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien comenzo a formarse desde en su infancia como revolucionario extraordinario, se puso al frente de la revolucion siendo destacado dirigente ansiado tanto por la epoca y la nacion.
					
					   Por eso, el pueblo coreano pudo tener la maxima fortuna de acoger al gran lider por primera vez en la historia nacional de varios milenios.
					
					  Esto es el mas extraordinario merito realizado por Kim Hyong Jik por la patria y el pueblo.
					
					  El dio a los coreanos la fortuna de contar con excelente lider, que no tienen otros pueblos del mundo, y dejo como herencias la idea de "Jiwon", la disposicion para hacer frente a las tres alternativas, la conquista de camaradas y los dos revolveres, las cuales sirvieron de precioso patrimonio revolucionario que impulso el inicio y el avance victorioso de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  El sublime ideario "Jiwon" de Kim Hyong Jik continua vigente de siglo a siglo en la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar), la nueva de la revolucion del Juche.
					
					  Todo el pueblo coreano debe luchar intensamente por acercar el dia en que pueda vivir felizmente en la gran potencia prospera reunificada.

articles.title: DGCDZE condena la actitud insincera de la parte surcoreana
articles.content:
DGCDZE condena la actitud insincera de la parte surcoreana
  Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ATCC) --  En relacion con que el contacto de trabajo de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK) corre el riesgo de ruptura debido a la actitud infiel de las autoridades surcoreanas, el portavoz de la Direccion General Central del Desarrollo de la Zona Especial (DGCDZE) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 10 la declaracion.
					  La parte surcoreana, que acudio disgustada desde el principio al contacto de trabajo, mostro finalmente en la cuarta ronda de esta cita su atributo conflictivo, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					  En esa ocasion, ella rehuso totalmente debatir la enmienda del contrato de la ZIK, agenda principal del contacto, proponiendo prolijamente los problemas desvinculados.
					
					Ademas, se nego obstinadamente a aceptar nuestra justa demanda insistiendo en sus opiniones tan injustas y sofismas.
					
					  Esta actitud grosera e infiel de la parte surcoreana deviene la provocacion premeditada tendente a llevar a la ruptura el contacto de trabajo y las labores de la ZIK, siendo intolerable burla y desafio a la sinceridad y esfuerzos de la contraparte.
					
					  Pese a que las relaciones Norte-Sur cayeron en el estado de ruptura y llego al climax la tension militar, nuestra parte se esforzo en todo lo posible por evitar que esa situacion influenciara mucho en la ZIK.
					
					Ademas, presento las propuestas constructivas de reexaminar y renegociar las medidas prerrogativas conforme a la situacion cambiada y a las circunstancias actuales y propicio el contacto de trabajo a pesar de la ruptura total de las relaciones entre las autoridades de ambas partes.
					
					  Pero, la parte surcoreana actuo en sentido diametralmente opuesto despreciando todos los esfuerzos y la buena fe de nuestra parte.
					
					  Este hecho demostro claramente que las autoridades surcoreanas no tienen ninguna voluntad de solucionar el problema de la ZIK sino piensan unicamente en destruir esa zona imputandonos la responsabilidad.
					
					Nos quedamos desilusionados de la actitud de la parte surcoreana desde el principio del contacto de trabajo y nos vemos obligados a volver a meditar seriamente en seguir o no en contactarnos con esa contraparte tan malagradecida y grosera.
					
					Aunque la parte Sur propone los llamados "tres principios", viola totalmente la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hablando tanto del "cumplimiento del acuerdo ya existente" y plantea algunos problemas ajenos al contacto de trabajo so pretexto de la "separacion entre lo politico y lo economico". 
					
					Es precisamente la parte surcoreana que intenta romper la Zona Industrial preconizando el "aumento de la competitividad y la aspiracion al futuro".
					
					Dado que las autoridades surcoreanas insultan la magnanimidad y los esfuerzos sinceros de nuestra parte y nos tratan de manera desafiante, nos pusimos escepticos de la solucion de los problemas por via negociada, o sea, a traves del contacto de trabajo de la ZIK.
					
					Si la parte Sur no asiste sinceramente a esta cita, optaremos por cumplir nuestra decision, como ya ha aclarado.
					
					El contacto de trabajo y las perspectivas de la ZIK dependen enteramente de la actitud de la parte Sur.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia el plan de "operacion civil" de banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia el plan de "operacion civil" de banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ATCC) -- En relacion con que el Ministerio de Defensa Nacional titere del Sur de Corea publico recientemente el "proyecto de enmienda del plan principal de la reforma de defensa nacional", el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 9 la informacion no. 952. 
					En ese provocativo plan para la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos publicaron el guion de la llamada "operacion civil" hablando de la "toma" del territorio de alguien en la eventual guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					En esa "operacion" se movilizaran las fuerzas armadas reservistas, aparte del ejercito regular surcoreano que se incorporaria en los combates.
					
					En virtud del guion senalado, los titeres surcoreanos intentan convertir del ano 2010 al 2011 a las 10 divisiones del "ejercito de reserva local" en las unidades para la "operacion civil". 
					
					Igualmente, anunciaron a bombo y platillos que les impartirian periodicamente cada ano la educacion militar centrada en el procedimiento en las batallas de verdad y elevarian su movilidad en el "tiempo de emergencia" al proveerles de muchos equipos belicos como el carro blindado.
					
					Esto deviene la grave provocacion a la RPDC, la negativa total al digno sistema socialista de ella centrado en las masas populares y el intolerable desafio a la unanime aspiracion de toda la nacion a la reunificacion pacifica del pais. 
					
					La RPDC se mantiene en su invariable posicion de lograr la reunificacion del pais de manera independiente y por via pacifica de acuerdo con la voluntad y los intereses de toda la nacion coreana. 
					
					Pero, no perdona ni en lo minimo a los invasores y provocadores que violan la paz e impiden la reunificacion. 
					
					El plan de la "operacion civil" de los belicistas del circulo militar titere surcoreano no pasa de ser otro designio tan necio, pueril y ridiculo de los que no saben ni jota de la RPDC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador brasileno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador brasileno
Pyongyang, 10 de julio (ATCC) -- Arnaldo Carrilho presento el dia 9 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Federativa de Brasil en Corea.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.
